title: Happy Birthday, Chika-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>Happy birthday, Chika-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Thank you, Kotori-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>I hope you’ll enjoy today’s party.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ahaha, I’m already super excited for it! Honoka-chan asked me, “Short skits or one-liners, which one do you want to see?” the other day, and I wasn’t really sure what to make of it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Ahaha....  Honoka-chan was really determined to surprise you with her performance, so....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>It’s the first time I’ve ever gotten a birthday party invitation that has “one-liners” and “theatrical play” written on it, so I’m just so excited!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Shizuku-chan was also really into it, so do look forward to it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I will! Are you going to do something too, Kotori-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Well, that’s a secret until the show! But besides the performance, I made your favorite mikan cake, so let’s eat it together, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Mikan cake!? Yaaay~ I can’t wait to eat it~! I wish the party would start already~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
